name: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
process: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a pan, sauté pancetta and garlic until golden.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs and grated cheese.
Drain cooked spaghetti and toss with the egg mixture.
Add pancetta, season with salt and pepper, and serve.

name: Grilled Salmon
process: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
Brush salmon fillets with olive oil and season with salt, pepper, and dried dill.
Place lemon slices on top of each fillet.
Grill for 4-5 minutes per side or until salmon flakes easily.
Serve with additional lemon slices.

name: Chocolate Cake
process: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease and flour two 9-inch round cake pans.
In a large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder, and baking soda.
Add eggs, milk, oil, and vanilla extract. Mix until well combined.
Stir in boiling water until the batter is smooth. The batter will be thin.
Pour the batter into prepared pans and bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted comes out clean.

name: Greek Salad
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
process: In a large bowl, combine cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, olives, and feta cheese.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, red wine vinegar, dried oregano, salt, and pepper.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
Serve chilled and enjoy!

name: Vegetarian Stir-Fry
process: In a wok or large skillet, heat sesame oil over medium-high heat.
Add garlic and ginger, and sauté until fragrant.
Add broccoli, bell peppers, carrot, and zucchini. Stir-fry until vegetables are tender-crisp.
In a small bowl, mix soy sauce with dissolved cornstarch. Pour over the vegetables and toss to coat.
Continue cooking until the sauce thickens. Serve over rice.
